channel.title: Career Development on Josh Wulf
channel.description: Recent content in Career Development on Josh Wulf

item.title: The Impact GitHub is Having on Your Software Career, Right Now…
item.description: Update 2019: This article was originally published on Medium.com on Feb 21, 2017, and got 183 comments on Reddit, and 237 comments on Hacker News. Many commenters said it couldn’t be done — they worked in closed source fintech shops, on BitBucket, and reasons… So I quit my job as a recruiter, got a job at a closed source fintech on BitBucket, and got it done within 15 months — read about it on Open Source.
